vision.notes: Praying mantids are generally known to have good vision, crucial for prey detection and hunting. Likely present and important in this family.

mechanoreception.notes: Mantids use mechanoreceptors to sense vibrations and air currents, aiding in predator avoidance and prey capture. Likely present in Eremiaphilidae.

chemoreception.notes: Antennae are present and used for detecting chemical cues. Likely used in mate location and possibly prey detection.
